# qala docker module
#
#

docker pull almalinux/10-base
docker pull almalinux/10-base:10.0-20250909
docker pull rockylinux:9.3.20231119


docker exec -it beautiful_bell "/bin/bash"

docker start stupefied_wright
docker exec -it stupefied_wright "/bin/bash"

docker stop stupefied_wright

docker run -it -v "D:\dev:/testing" almalinux/10-init
docker run -it -v "D:\dev:/testing" almalinux/10-base


cp -R zig-x86_64-linux-0.16.0-dev.732+2f3234c76/ ~/zig



yum -y install ncurses
yum -y install rust
yum -y install epel-release
yum -y install snapd
yum -y install xz
yum -y install gc
yum -y install cmake
yum -y install git
yum -y install valgrind
yum -y install go
yum -y install perl
yum -y install strace
yum -y install sudo
yum -y install gdb


apk add strace


dnf update -y
dnf install java-11-openjdk-devel -y




echo 'export PATH="/testing/download/zig-x86_64-linux-0.16.0-dev.732+2f3234c76:$PATH"' >> ~/.bashrc
echo 'export PATH="/root/zig:$PATH"' >> ~/.bashrc
source ~/.bashrc

export ZIG_GLOBAL_CACHE_DIR=$PWD

zig
adduser tuser1
passwd tuser1
usermod -aG wheel tuser1
id tuser1
su - tuser1


strace -f -o zig_trace.log zig build


systemctl enable --now snapd.socket

uname -m


# pwds
abcd
root
